hero.name: Hussein Ashraf
hero.jobTitle: Frontend Developer  with 1 year or more of experience.
hero.description: Building interactive digital solutions that drive business growth.

about.description1: I am a Frontend end Developer, proficient in (HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap, Sass, Javascript, React, Angular,Typescript , Redux, Material UI, Tailwind, Bootstrap, Git, Github).
about.description2: I am passionate about developing user-friendly web applications, to contribute to innovative projects and enhance my skills.
about.description3: My motto is 'Do what you love, love what you do,' and I aim to excel and innovate in this field.
about.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science & AI
about.university: Beni Suef University, Faculty of Computer and Artificial Intelligence
